text: hananim-i geudeuljung han salam-egegyesileul naelieo baegseongdeul-ege gyeong-gohadolog han geos-i geudeul-eul nollage hayeossdan mal-inyo midneun jadeul-egeneun bog-eum eul jeonhala geudeul-eun junim ap-eseo nop-eun jinliui wichileul hwagbohago issno la geuleona bulsinjadeul-eun igeos-eul bun myeonghan masul-ilago malhadeola
